events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster as a software developer candidate.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to assist you through the interview process.
Your initial screening interview was conducted successfully, discussing your development experience and problem-solving skills.
Thank you for your prompt and detailed responses during the initial screening. We appreciate your enthusiasm for the software engineer role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 16th, where you will be assessed on your coding and system design abilities.
